#high medium and low deviation scags
```{r}
scags <- read_csv("simulation_data/QQPlots_scagnostics.csv", 
    col_types = cols(X1 = col_skip()))
info <- read_csv("simulation_data/QQPlots_info.csv",
                 col_types = cols(X1 = col_skip()))

scags <- info %>%
  dplyr::select(ID, distribution, N) %>%
  right_join(scags)

scags <- scags %>%
  mutate(signal = ifelse(distribution == "Normal", "Noise", "Signal")) %>%
  spread(key = scag_num, value = scagnostics, sep = "_")

plots <- read_csv("simulation_data/QQplots.csv", 
                  col_types = cols(X1 = col_skip()))

#high
highID <- first(scags$ID[scags$deviation.base > 0.8])
ggplot(plots %>% filter(ID == highID )) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(), axis.title = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank())
scags %>% filter(ID == highID ) %>% dplyr::select(deviation.multSq)


#medium
medID <- first(scags$ID[scags$deviation.multSq > 0.52 & scags$deviation.multSq < 0.53])
ggplot(plots %>% filter(ID == medID )) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = y))+ 
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(), axis.title = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank())
scags %>% filter(ID == medID ) %>% dplyr::select(deviation.multSq)


#low
lowID <- first(scags$ID[scags$deviation.multSq < 0.01])
ggplot(plots %>% filter(ID == lowID )) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = x, y = y))+ 
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(), axis.title = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank())
scags %>% filter(ID == lowID ) %>% dplyr::select(deviation.multSq)


```
